texts.definition: Immovable game elements that provide players with actions or resources.
markups: <style="Definition">Immovable game elements that provide players with actions or resources.</style>

Some actions are resources in games are localized to occur at specific points in game worlds. <style="CurrentLink">Bases</style> are game elements that provide these and often can be modified, constructed, or destroyed as part of gameplay.

<style="CurrentLink">Bases</style> exist in all <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Civilization%20(video%20game)%20series">Civilization series</link></style> in the form of cities. Provinces in the <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Europa%20Universalis%20series">Europa Universalis series</link></style> can be seen as <style="CurrentLink">Bases</style> as well, but this is a weaker example since these are entire regions of the game world.

<style="CurrentLink">Bases</style> are used in games to provide <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Resource%20Generators">Resource Generators</link></style> and <style="Link"><link="location-fixed-abilities">Location-Fixed Abilities</link></style>, quite often some which have to do with <style="Link"><link="area-control">Area Control</link></style> and <style="Link"><link="combat">Combat</link></style>. Another use which builds upon these basic uses are to let players affect <style="Link"><link="choke-points">Choke Points</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Strongholds">Strongholds</link></style> and <style="Link"><link="strategic-locations">Strategic Locations</link></style> in <style="Link"><link="game-worlds">Game Worlds</link></style> (in the case of <style="Link"><link="strategic-locations">Strategic Locations</link></style> their <style="Link"><link="construction">Construction</link></style> may create new <style="Link"><link="strategic-locations">Strategic Locations</link></style>). <style="Link"><link="territories">Territories</link></style> can be used instead of <style="CurrentLink">Bases</style> in many cases, see for example how empty provinces can be colonized and owned ones can be improved in the <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Europa%20Universalis%20series">Europa Universalis series</link></style>, or a combination of both can be used.

The design choices related to <style="CurrentLink">Bases</style> concern what <style="Link"><link="location-fixed-abilities">Location-Fixed Abilities</link></style> they should provide and if <style="Link"><link="construction">Construction</link></style> of them is possible, and in that case what is required to do so. <style="CurrentLink">Bases</style> typically have <style="Link"><link="characteristics">Characteristics</link></style> related to their abilities. In this case they are, or are part of <style="Link"><link="abstract-player-constructs">Abstract Player Constructs</link></style> and can have <style="Link"><link="abstract-player-construct-development">Abstract Player Construct Development</link></style>.

<style="CurrentLink">Bases</style> are complex <style="Link"><link="installations">Installations</link></style> with <style="Link"><link="location-fixed-abilities">Location-Fixed Abilities</link></style> in <style="Link"><link="game-worlds">Game Worlds</link></style>. They are often also <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Resource%20Generators">Resource Generators</link></style> or <style="Link"><link="resource-locations">Resource Locations</link></style> or built where these exist, and in general create <style="Link"><link="strategic-locations">Strategic Locations</link></style> unless these already existed where they were built. Creating one gives <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Ownership">Ownership</link></style> while existing ones provide <style="Link"><link="gain-ownership">Gain Ownership</link></style> goals to players that don't own it. The building of <style="CurrentLink">Bases</style> can signify <style="Link"><link="expansion">Expansion</link></style> phases while putting them to best use can signify <style="Link"><link="exploitation">Exploitation</link></style> phases.
The existence of <style="CurrentLink">Bases</style>, or ability to build such, are likely to affect any <style="Link"><link="laning">Laning</link></style> phase present in a game.

<style="Link"><link="abstract-player-constructs">Abstract Player Constructs</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="abstract-player-construct-development">Abstract Player Construct Development</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="area-control">Area Control</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="characteristics">Characteristics</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="combat">Combat</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="construction">Construction</link></style>
